mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART(CARTNO, CAMOUNT, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, MEMNO, PNO, STATENO) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cAmount}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 2, #{pNo}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY C.CARTNO DESC), C.CARTNO, C.CAMOUNT, C.STARTDATE, C.ENDDATE, C.MEMNO, C.PNO, P.PAMOUNT, P.PPRICE, P.PNAME, P.PFILE FROM CART C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PNO = P.PNO
